name: Recycler 2D
description:
Use your mouse to move the trash into the correct recycling bin, every time you do you'll be given 1 point. If trash falls off the conveyer belt into the trash you will get a strike, if you get 3 strikes the game will end. Have fun!

Feel free to share your score in the comments! :)

Check out the Devlog if that's your thing.

Made in the Godot Engine
